relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: CPC (Cartesian Perceptual Compression)
description: Cartesian Perceptual Compression.  CPC specification defines datastream encoding and file format for a compressed, raster (bit-mapped) image, designed for scanned bitonal documents.
